overview_summary: All profiled neighbors have no documented public stance regarding the development, with 0 openly supporting or opposing it. One neighbor holds a high-impact position (the long-serving county sheriff), while the others appear to have low community influence due to limited public roles.

neighbors.name: James W. Phillips Jr. et al.
neighbors.claims: James W. Phillips Jr. has served as Dorchester County Sheriff since 2002 ([msa.maryland.gov](https://msa.maryland.gov/msa/mdmanual/36loc/do/jud/sheriffs/html/msa14125.html#:~:text=Sheriff%2C%20Dorchester%20County%2C%20since%20December,former%20chief%20deputy)). He also chairs the county Recreation and Parks Board and sits on the Drug and Alcohol Abuse Council, reflecting a significant local leadership role ([msa.maryland.gov](https://msa.maryland.gov/msa/mdmanual/36loc/do/jud/sheriffs/html/msa14125.html#:~:text=Member%2C%20Drug%20and%20Alcohol%20Abuse,Wic%20Community%20College)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage via formal briefing with county officials to ensure Sheriff Phillips is informed. Emphasize public safety measures and community benefits while addressing any law enforcement or traffic concerns.

neighbors.name: Justin T. Koshar
neighbors.claims: Justin T. Koshar is a local property owner with no public record of involvement in civic groups or local government ([mdfarmbureau.com](https://mdfarmbureau.com/dorchester-county-board-of-directors/#:~:text=BOARD%20MEMBERS)). His name does not appear in known community leadership lists, suggesting a low public profile ([mdfarmbureau.com](https://mdfarmbureau.com/dorchester-county-board-of-directors/#:~:text=BOARD%20MEMBERS)).

approach_recommendations.engage: A personal one-on-one outreach is recommended to hear any concerns he may have. Emphasize open communication and the steps being taken to minimize impacts on his property and lifestyle.

neighbors.name: Tyler Lee Mabry
neighbors.claims: Tyler Lee Mabry owns multiple parcels in the area (per county records) but holds no visible role in local organizations ([mdfarmbureau.com](https://mdfarmbureau.com/dorchester-county-board-of-directors/#:~:text=Dale%20Collins%20Barbara%20Edgar%20Trent,Mike%20Nicholas%20Max%20Schnoor%2C%20Jr)). His absence from community or agricultural leadership forums indicates a limited public presence ([mdfarmbureau.com](https://mdfarmbureau.com/dorchester-county-board-of-directors/#:~:text=Dale%20Collins%20Barbara%20Edgar%20Trent,Mike%20Nicholas%20Max%20Schnoor%2C%20Jr)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out with a neighborly approach to discuss the project’s plans. Highlight any measures protecting farmland and address practical issues like drainage or access to ensure his land interests are respected.

neighbors.name: Charles Andrew Clow
neighbors.claims: Charles Andrew Clow has no noted involvement in public meetings or local committees ([mdfarmbureau.com](https://mdfarmbureau.com/dorchester-county-board-of-directors/#:~:text=BOARD%20MEMBERS)). Public records do not show him in any community leadership positions, implying a low-profile local presence ([mdfarmbureau.com](https://mdfarmbureau.com/dorchester-county-board-of-directors/#:~:text=BOARD%20MEMBERS)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Use a friendly, informal approach to introduce the project and listen to any concerns. Emphasize that the development will respect residential peace and not adversely affect surrounding properties.
